statements: SELECT * FROM behavior_data;
SELECT lead_name, behavior_type FROM behavior_data ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT lead_id, behavior_description FROM behavior_data WHERE behavior_type='click';
SELECT lead_name, behavior_description FROM behavior_data WHERE lead_id=101;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM behavior_data ORDER BY behavior_type ASC, behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM behavior_data WHERE lead_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT lead_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'click' AND behavior_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp ASC;
SELECT lead_name, COUNT(*) AS total_behavior_count FROM behavior_data GROUP BY lead_name ORDER BY total_behavior_count DESC;

SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM behavior_data WHERE behavior_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59' GROUP BY behavior_type ORDER BY behavior_count DESC;

SELECT lead_id, lead_name, behavior_type, behavior_description, DATE_FORMAT(behavior_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS formatted_timestamp FROM behavior_data WHERE lead_id = 12345 ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Segment;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM Segment;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM Segment WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT lead_name, behavior_data FROM Lead;
SELECT lead_name, behavior_data FROM Lead WHERE segment_id = 2;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM Lead WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, description FROM Segment WHERE segment_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Segment WHERE segment_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, behavior_data FROM Lead WHERE segment_id = 3 AND lead_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, description FROM Segment WHERE segment_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND segment_name <> 'Test';
SELECT * FROM Segment;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM Segment WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT segment_id, segment_description FROM Segment WHERE segment_name = 'New Segment';
SELECT * FROM Lead WHERE lead_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT campaign_name FROM Campaign WHERE campaign_type = 'Online';
SELECT * FROM Segment WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM Segment WHERE segment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Lead WHERE lead_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM Lead WHERE lead_behavior = 'engaged' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type FROM Campaign WHERE campaign_status = 'active' ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM segments;
SELECT segment_name, segment_id FROM segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT lead_name, behavior_name FROM leads JOIN lead_behaviors ON leads.lead_id = lead_behaviors.lead_id JOIN behaviors ON lead_behaviors.behavior_id = behaviors.behavior_id;
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(*) as lead_count FROM segments LEFT JOIN leads ON segments.segment_id = leads.segment_id GROUP BY segment_name;
SELECT * FROM behaviors WHERE behavior_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM segments;
SELECT segment_name, segment_id FROM segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT lead_name, behavior_name FROM leads JOIN lead_behaviors ON leads.lead_id = lead_behaviors.lead_id JOIN behaviors ON lead_behaviors.behavior_id = behaviors.behavior_id;
SELECT DISTINCT segment_name FROM segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT segment_name, lead_name, behavior_name FROM leads JOIN lead_behaviors ON leads.lead_id = lead_behaviors.lead_id JOIN behaviors ON lead_behaviors.behavior_id = behaviors.behavior_id ORDER BY segment_name ASC, lead_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Segment;
SELECT segment_name, segment_criteria FROM Segment WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, email FROM Lead ORDER BY lead_id DESC;
SELECT behavior_name, behavior_data FROM LeadBehavior WHERE lead_id = 5 AND behavior_id < 10;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaign WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT lead_name, email FROM Lead;
SELECT lead_name, email, segment_name FROM Lead JOIN Segment ON Lead.segment_id = Segment.segment_id;
SELECT behavior_name, behavior_data FROM LeadBehavior ORDER BY behavior_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaign WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT lead_name, email, segment_name, target_criteria FROM Lead JOIN Segment ON Lead.segment_id = Segment.segment_id JOIN CampaignTarget ON Segment.segment_id = CampaignTarget.segment_id;
